attributes.action: Allow chronic pain-sufferers legal access to cannabis for personal use!  PLEASE!
attributes.additional_details:
I KNOW that vaped cannabis works... I have tried it, and it is SO effective!
Other countries are very reluctant to send it to me, as it could result in us both facing charges. 
This seems SO unfair, when I KNOW that safe pain relief is possible from this avenue, and yet I am not allowed to access it. 
I am unable to drive, because of my physical health, so even DUI is not a danger. 
PLEASE change the law which is at present barring myself and so many others from access to relief from suffering!
attributes.background:
I'm 71, in great pain from spinal, joint, muscle and nerve conditions, inc. significant spinal-cord damage.
I have been taken off all the morphine, tramadol, codeine, etc. that I was on, for the sake of my liver and kidneys which were suffering greatly. The pain is now atrocious and debilitating!!
